item.title: The Temple: Foundation
item.description:
The Philosophy of the Temple

The body is not a vanity project; it is the hardware upon which the mind runs. A weak chassis cannot support a high-performance engine.

It’s of ultimate necessity to treat our body with the importance it deserves, as it is the means through which we express our will onto the world. In the same way that the mind must be trained to be as sharp as possible so that we can achieve our ultimate potential, the same goes for our vessel (quite philosophical, isn’t it?). Doing so will maximize everything we do, while bringing along some well-deserved self-esteem.
